name: CommunityAdminImplementation
description: Welcome to CommunityAdmin, the main contract. This is an administrative (for now) contract where the admins have control over the list of communities. Being only able to add and remove communities.

eventDecorators.name: CommunityAdded
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a community has been added.

parameterDecorators.name: communityAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the community that has been added.

parameterDecorators.name: maxTranche
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the maxTranche For further information regarding each parameter, see *Community* smart contract initialize method.

eventDecorators.name: CommunityFunded
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a community has been funded.

eventDecorators.name: CommunityMigrated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a community has been migrated.

parameterDecorators.name: managers
parameterDecorators.description: Addresses of the new community's initial managers.

eventDecorators.name: CommunityRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a community has been removed.

parameterDecorators.name: communityAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the community that has been removed.

eventDecorators.name: CommunityTemplateUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the communityTemplate address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: TransferERC20
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

eventDecorators.name: TreasuryUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

parameterDecorators.name: claimAmount_
parameterDecorators.description: base amount to be claim by the beneficiary.

parameterDecorators.name: maxClaim_
parameterDecorators.description: limit that a beneficiary can claim at in total.

parameterDecorators.name: decreaseStep_
parameterDecorators.description: value decreased from maxClaim for every beneficiary added.

parameterDecorators.name: incrementInterval_
parameterDecorators.description: increment interval used in each claim.

parameterDecorators.name: minTranche_
parameterDecorators.description: minimum amount that the community will receive when requesting funds.

parameterDecorators.name: maxTranche_
parameterDecorators.description: maximum amount that the community will receive when requesting funds.

functionDecorators.name: addManagerToCommunity
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new manager to a community.

parameterDecorators.name: account_
parameterDecorators.description: address to be added as community manager.

functionDecorators.name: communityListAt
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of a community from communityList.

functionDecorators.name: fundCommunity
functionDecorators.description: Funds an existing community if it hasn't enough funds.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Used to initialize a new CommunityAdmin contract.

parameterDecorators.name: communityTemplate_
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the Community implementation used for deploying new communities.

functionDecorators.name: migrateCommunity
functionDecorators.description: Migrates a community by deploying a new contract.

parameterDecorators.name: previousCommunity_
parameterDecorators.description: address of the community to be migrated.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeCommunity
functionDecorators.description: Removes an existing community. All community funds are transferred to the treasury.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from this contract to an address.

functionDecorators.name: transferFromCommunity
functionDecorators.description: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from community to an address.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateBeneficiaryParams
functionDecorators.description: Updates the beneficiary params of a community.

parameterDecorators.name: claimAmount_
parameterDecorators.description: base amount to be claim by the beneficiary.

parameterDecorators.name: maxClaim_
parameterDecorators.description: limit that a beneficiary can claim in total.

parameterDecorators.name: decreaseStep_
parameterDecorators.description: value decreased from maxClaim each time a is beneficiary added.

parameterDecorators.name: incrementInterval_
parameterDecorators.description: increment interval used in each claim.

parameterDecorators.name: minTranche_
parameterDecorators.description: minimum amount that the community will receive when requesting funds.

parameterDecorators.name: maxTranche_
parameterDecorators.description: maximum amount that the community will receive when requesting funds.

functionDecorators.name: updateCommunityTemplate
functionDecorators.description: Updates the address of the the communityTemplate.

parameterDecorators.name: newCommunityTemplate_
parameterDecorators.description: address of the new communityTemplate contract.

functionDecorators.name: updateProxyImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Updates proxy implementation address of a community.

functionDecorators.name: updateTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Updates the address of the treasury.

parameterDecorators.name: newTreasury_
parameterDecorators.description: address of the new treasury contract.
